mapper.sql: log_id, op_item_id, user_id, dept_id, question_id, op_desc, op_date, ip
mapper.insert: insert into t_op_log(log_id, op_item_id, user_id, dept_id, question_id, op_desc, op_date, ip) values (#{logId}, #{opItemId}, #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{questionId}, #{opDesc}, #{opDate}, #{ip})
mapper.update: update t_op_log set op_item_id = #{opItemId}, user_id = #{userId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, question_id = #{questionId}, op_desc = #{opDesc}, op_date = #{opDate}, ip = #{ip} where log_id = #{logId}
